alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Luna County through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Deming, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deming, Sunshine, and Rock Hound State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 74 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
